page.shortlink: api client api a5 u html highlight method

argument.name: html
argument.description: The HTML to preform the highlight on.

argument.name: search
argument.description: An array of strings or single string to search for in the HTML.

argument.name: prefix
argument.description: The prefix to put before a search match. If no value is specified then an HTML B tag will be used.

argument.name: suffix
argument.description: The suffix to put after a search match. If no value is specified then an HTML B tag will be used.

argument.name: replacer
argument.description: A function to use to replace each match. This can be used to generate IDs for each highlight.

return.name: html
return.description: The HTML with search results highlighted.

page.description: Search highlighting for text in and HTML string.

discussion.p: This method will take an arbitrary HTML string, and place prefix and suffix HTML around matches that are not in HTML tags.
